summary: THE CONSUMER RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE #04V036000 (IGNITION SWITCH). THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALERSHIP FOR REPAIR ON 10/11/04. THE  MECHANIC REPLACED RELAY SWITCH BUT NOT THE IGNITION SWITCH.  THE VEHICLE WAS ABLE TO BE STARTED BUT WILL NOT TURN OFF PROPERLY.  THE MECHANIC INDICATED THAT REPLACING THE IGNITION SWITCH WAS NOT PART THE RECALL.  *JB
